summary: This bill, HR 1372, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 300 Macedonia Lane in Knoxville, Tennessee, as the "Reverend Harold Middlebrook Post Office Building." The bill outlines the official designation and stipulates that any existing references to the facility should be updated to reflect the new name. Several members of the House of Representatives sponsored the bill and it was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
